title: Cinnamon and apple pork belly with mulled cider cabbage and roast almonds
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 2oz belly pork, fat scored with a sharp knife
2 Granny Smith apples, peeled, cored and sliced
200ml/7fl oz organic medium cider, plus extra for basting
500g/1lb 2oz red cabbage, core removed, finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
